title: Intel CEO to oversee its AI efforts after executive departs for OpenAI
description:
SAN FRANCISCO -Intel said on Monday its CEO Lip-Bu Tan would oversee the chipmaker's artificial intelligence efforts after the firm's chief technology officer departed for ChatGPT maker OpenAI.

content:

title: SoftBank's OpenAI wager in focus as analysts upgrade share price target
description: Technology investor SoftBank Group reports second quarter earnings results on Tuesday in the midst of feverish investment in artificial intelligence that has sent its share price soaring.
content:

title: Military experts warn security hole in most AI chatbots can sow chaos
description: Current and former military officers are warning that countries are likely to exploit a security hole in artificial intelligence chatbots.
content:
Current and former military officers are warning that adversaries are likely to exploit a natural flaw in artificial intelligence chatbots to inject instructions for stealing files, distorting public opinion or otherwise betraying trusted users.

title: Profound Medical Regains Exclusive Distribution Rights for TULSA-PRO® in Canada from Knight
description: TORONTO, Nov. 10, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Profound Medical Corp. (NASDAQ:PROF; TSX:PRN) ('Profound” or the 'Company”), a commercial-stage medical device company that develops and markets artificial intelligence ('AI”)-powered, MRI-guided, incision-free therapies for the ablation of diseased tissue, is pleased to announce that it has regained exclusive distribution rights for TULSA-PRO® in Canada from Knight Therapeutics Inc.
